descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/t94iid68u93u5py/manny.png?dl=1&token_hash=AAEIEPhxKj2lO3-1wXsAl9Vypgf6k4TsVc3sxuYWQTLS1Q[/img]

[img]http://s14.postimage.org/pnadjn02p/titolo.jpg[/img]

[url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/sSbds.png[/img][/url]

[youtube]HNkzYUUcZ40[/youtube]
[youtube]NVlJB0-h5nE[/youtube][youtube]b1Om6g-zpaY[/youtube][youtube]gzR19TwsJDU[/youtube][youtube]BSeZDynxJzE[/youtube][/center]

* OVERVIEW *
It's time to say "I can't see any sh*t!" during snow storms!
This mod tweaks the vanilla snow and rain storms weathers by making them more.... Extremely intense!
The snow storm it's my favourite, you can feel the cold around you!
Also this mod adds wind buffs and reduces the distant view.
It have new custom textures and it is script free, so no impact to your savegame data.

[center][img]http://s16.postimage.org/s00ubf83p/multiple.jpg[/img][/center]

* COMPATIBILITY *

[quote]I'll try this instead of more rain and more snow. if it is like those mods then my prayers have been answered!

Update: Holy s***-kaka, everything is working together! I am finally able to experience Skyrim with:

CoT, The Wilds ENB(CoT preset), Minty's Lightning during ThunderStorms, Immersive Skyrim Thunder V6, Rainbows, and Supreme Storms phew!

All thanks to you Manny, it's been a good day :)[/quote]

This mod will be compatible with all other environmental mods like RCRN and Climates of Tamriel. Just place at bottom order loading.

* INSTALL *
Unpack, activate it by the Menu Launcher and enjoy!

* UNINSTALL *
Just delete the ESP

* QUICK TEST *
To test the weather just write in console these commands:
fw c8220 -> Set a rain storm
fw c8221 -> Set a snow storm

To revert back to clear use:
fw 81a -> Set a clear sky

* BUGS *
Please report to me any bugs

* FACEBOOK AND TWITTER *
[url=https://www.facebook.com/MannyGTSkyrimMods]https://www.facebook.com/MannyGTSkyrimMods[/url]
[url=https://twitter.com/SkyrimMannyGT]https://twitter.com/SkyrimMannyGT[/url]

FOLLOW ME!
